summary: I am an environmental scientist specialised in soil microbial ecology. I work as a researcher at the Soil Biology Group of Wageningen University, where I play at the interface between the research group and the laboratory. Since January 2023 I have been appointed as project manager of BENCHMARKS, a 5-year transdisciplinary Horizon Europe project. My research interests lie in the field of soil functions and soil health, environmental quality and sustainability.

profile_positions.description:
I am leading WP7-Management and Co-ordination of BENCHMAKRS project (Horizon Europe), where the main objective is to oversee the management and the internal communication procedures between the 29 partners of the consortium. Furthermore, I oversee and coordinate the lab analyses within the Soil Biology Lab.

For the Soil Biology group I take care of the connection between the research group and the lab and the research group and the Soil Science cluster of WUR.

I am one of the coordinators of the National Centre for Soil Ecology (NCSE https://www.soilecology.eu/)
profile_positions.title: Scientific Project Manager & Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Within the Soil Biology Group I played at the interface between the research group and the laboratory. 

Main tasks were: 1) Coordination of the research and development of methods for the Soil Biology Lab; 2) Management of the BIOSIS Platform (biosisplatform.eu) which incorporates models for soil quality and function assessment; 3) Coordination of the postgraduate courses offered by the Soil Biology Group.
profile_positions.title: Lab Research Coordinator & Researcher

profile_positions.description: I coordinated and lead several projects, funded by the EU commission and Dutch public agencies. My main activities were related to the evaluation of the status and functions of the soil microbial community to promote soil quality and sustainability of agricultural systems. My activities also included the analysis and evaluation of results, preparation of reports and to a lesser extent I was involved in the project financial management. In addition, I coordinated the work of a laboratory assistant.
profile_positions.title: Researcher

profile_positions.description: I studied the role of microbes in soil carbon dynamics using both experimental work and biomolecular tools.
profile_positions.title: PhD Candidate

profile_positions.description: Research on the influence of nitrogen on soil fungal community and changes in soil organic matter turnover in forest soils using biomolecular techniques and enzyme assays.
profile_positions.title: Junior Researcher

profile_positions.description: APPA Trento (Environmental Protection Agency of Trento) - Application of biotic indices to assess the quality of freshwater ecosystems. Collaboration with the Pontificia Universidad Catolica de Chile and Ca' Foscari University of Venice.
profile_positions.title: Environmental Scientist

profile_positions.description: Environmental education and awareness to kids, teenagers and adults in natural and semi-natural areas.
profile_positions.title: Environmental Educator
